title: Unify visual layout for Radar and Trading Opportunities tabs

requirements.text: Update the Radar tab UI (frontend/src/components/RadarDashboard.tsx) so its overall page layout, spacing, and primary container styling match the established visual pattern used by the other tabs (e.g., Market Overview / Top Recommendations): a consistent top-level structure without extra/inconsistent padding and with a primary Card container using the same theme-driven border/background/backdrop styles.

quotes: As abas Radar e Trading Opportunity devem ter o mesmo formato visual que as outras abas.

acceptanceCriteria: Radar tab no longer adds extra outer padding/margins that make it look visually different from other tabs (e.g., remove/adjust any redundant outer `p-4` wrappers when TabsContent already controls spacing).
Radar tab has a single, consistent top-level container structure aligned with other tabs (Card-based header/section styling consistent with existing tab patterns).

Visual elements (header block, filter block, list container) align with the app’s existing theme variables and common Card/backdrop treatment used elsewhere (no bespoke gradient treatment that makes Radar look like a different template).

requirements.text: Update the Trading Opportunities tab UI (frontend/src/components/Opportunities.tsx) so its page header and primary container styling match the established visual pattern used by the other tabs (e.g., Market Overview / Top Recommendations), replacing any standalone heading layout with the same Card-based header/container approach.

quotes: As abas Radar e Trading Opportunity devem ter o mesmo formato visual que as outras abas.

acceptanceCriteria: The Opportunities tab renders its main title/description inside a CardHeader/Card layout consistent with other tabs (instead of a standalone h1 block).
The Opportunities tab’s top-level styling (borders/background/backdrop/shadow treatment) visually matches the common tab template used by MarketOverview/TopRecommendations.
No regressions to existing Opportunities functionality: modality tabs still switch content correctly; loading/error/empty states still render.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only and must be composed, not edited).
Keep changes limited to visual/layout consistency; do not change backend APIs or data-fetching behavior.
nonGoals: Translating the entire application UI to English or Portuguese.
Redesigning the information architecture or adding new features to Radar or Opportunities.
Changing alert/opportunity scoring logic or react-query caching behavior.
